body:
Currently, OpenStudio (0.9.3) supports EnergyPlus 7.1. Our releases are a bit "off" from one another and so there's always a period where the latest OpenStudio version supports the previous version of EnergyPlus. Sorry about that!


Rob Guglielmetti
National Renewable Energy Laboratory (NREL)
Commercial Buildings Research Group
15013 Denver West Parkway MS:RSF202
Golden, CO 80401
303.275.4319
robert.guglielmetti at nrel.gov






On 10/30/12 1:43 PM, "KXZ7007 ......" <kx7007 at yahoo.com<mailto:kx7007 at yahoo.com>> wrote:


 hi all,


Dose OpenStudio 0.9.3 support EnergyPlus 7.2
___
